recipe_name: Summer Fruit Salad with a Lemon, Honey, and Mint Dressing
ingredients: 4 cups cubed seeded watermelon, 2 cups sliced fresh strawberries, 2 large  fresh peaches, cut into cubes, 2 large  nectarines, cut into cubes, 1  red Anjou pear, cut into cubes, 1 cup seedless grapes, halved, 2  lemons, juiced,   +   1/4 cup minced fresh mint (chocolate mint preferred),   +   1/2  lemon, zested, 1 tablespoon honey (fireweed honey preferred)
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 3mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 20g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 51mg 256%, Calcium 25mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 316mg 7%
